dict.acceptation: 基础；主要成分；基准，基本原则；

sent.orig: Jiyuan is also an important energy basis, lead and zinc basis and coal chemical industry basis.
sent.trans: 其还是中西部地区重要的能源基地、锌基地和煤炭化工基地。

sent.orig: Jiyuan is also an important energy basis, and zinc basis and coal chemical industry basis.
sent.trans: 其还是中西部地区重要的能源基地、铅锌基地和煤炭化工基地。

sent.orig: The recognition basis of pension insurance accounting should combine basis and accrual basis.
sent.trans: 应采用权责发生制与收付实现制相结合的会计确认基础。

sent.orig: There is another basis of accounting referred as the cash basis.
sent.trans: 这是另一个会计基础知识——现金制度。

sent.orig: A new approximate method based on coupled radial basis functions and polynomial basis functions is presented.
sent.trans: 耦合径向基函数和多项式基函数，形成一种新的近似函数。
